column2: I really enjoyed my entire experience. We came on a Thursday night
column3: so luckily we didn't have to wait in line. I heard it gets crazy busy on the weekends though! They serve canned beers and even have a bucket nearby where you can borrow a koozie! The condiment bar offers up tons of options like: pickled jalapeños
column6: salsa and different sauces and mustard.
